message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to let it go for $15,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $15,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $12,500?

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. While I understand your position, I am still unable to meet you at $12,500. I would like to propose $11,000 as a counteroffer. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
